name: Taline
description:
While loading it might look like the game is broken but it takes some time to load

Level 9 is the last level. Level 10 is a Free Roam kind of level.

How to play:

Red and blue take alternate turns.

  • Click where you want to zip to.
  • Spacebar to release the hook.
  • Red player can hook to red tiles, blue can hook to blue.
  • Both can hook to purple tiles, and white tiles cannot be hooked.
  • Blue starts first.
  • Press "R" to restart.

Tileset Asset: https://arks.itch.io/dungeon-platform-tileset
